traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The bear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5 damage) slashing damage.
